author: cms-sw
body:
This PR backports various root fixes from 15.1.X release cycles to 15.0.X
- Generation of cuda.pcm, see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/47400
- Patches hls to include `cmath` instead of `math.h` to avoud cuda.pcm issues
- Backport root fixes
  - https://github.com/root-project/root/pull/18830 ( see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/46341 for details )
  - https://github.com/root-project/root/compare/4467b6916f08474c4a56ee7c77c9b282f1ba3e00...9880139790b33fea40d7657af669ba7d7aa877af
title: [15.0]Backport root bug fixes and generation of cuda.pcm
